Hi, I has experimenting with coevolving predator and prey creatures control=
led by a neural network, and used NEAT for the evolution, but when I look f=
or NEAT the first time, I saw that the latest version available has from 20=
01 (or 2002, don't remember now). There is a newer version of the NEAT sour=
ce code? Is HyperNEAT the "evolution" source code for NEAT? Which of them I=
 should use?

Thanks for your answers.

Also, I made some adjustments to th=
e original source code, to use QT instead of GTK, if someone is interested =
on that, let me know and I will share these modifications.
